docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump offer voters distinct choices this fall on issues that shape everyday lives. Actual ideas are in play, as difficult as it can be to see them through the surreal layers of the 2016 presidential campaign....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump offer voters distinct choices this fall on issues that shape everyday lives. Actual ideas are in play, as difficult as it can be to see them through the surreal layers of the 2016 presidential campaign.

headline.main: WHY IT MATTERS: Clinton, Trump Present Voters Clear Choice

docs.snippet: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump dug deeper in his efforts to cast doubt on the legitimacy of the U.S. election, saying on Twitter on Sunday that he believed the results were being "rigged" at many polling places....
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump dug deeper in his efforts to cast doubt on the legitimacy of the U.S. election, saying on Twitter on Sunday that he believed the results were being "rigged" at many polling places.

headline.main: Trump Charges U.S. Election Results Being Rigged 'at Many Polling Places'
headline.print_headline: Trump Charges U.S. Election Results Being Rigged 'at Many Polling Places'

headline.main: North Carolina G.O.P. Building Is Firebombed

docs.snippet: In Hillsborough, where liberal and conservative factions have peacefully managed the tensions between them, residents said the attack did not reflect the town’s spirit....
docs.lead_paragraph: In Hillsborough, where liberal and conservative factions have peacefully managed the tensions between them, residents said the attack did not reflect the town’s spirit.
docs.abstract: Firebombing attack on local Republican headquarters in Hillsborough, NC, is still under investigation by federal, state and local officials, with no arrests announced; residents say attack is out of step with spirit of small town, which has largely found amicable balance between liberal and conservative factions in face of cultural change.

headline.main: Firebombing of G.O.P. Office Jolts Fragile Balance of a North Carolina Town
headline.print_headline: Firebombing of G.O.P. Office Jolts a Town’s Fragile Balance

byline.contributor: Alan Blinder contributed reporting from Atlanta.

docs.snippet: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump's charitable foundation has stopped fundraising in New York state, the state attorney general's office said on Monday, weeks after the office warned that a failure to do so would constitute a "continuin...
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump's charitable foundation has stopped fundraising in New York state, the state attorney general's office said on Monday, weeks after the office warned that a failure to do so would constitute a "continuing fraud."

headline.main: Trump Foundation Stops Fundraising in New York State
headline.print_headline: Trump Foundation Stops Fundraising in New York State

docs.snippet: With roughly three weeks to Election Day, Republican strategists nationwide publicly concede Hillary Clinton has a firm grip on the 270 Electoral College votes needed to win the White House — and may be on her way to an even more decisive vi...
docs.lead_paragraph: With roughly three weeks to Election Day, Republican strategists nationwide publicly concede Hillary Clinton has a firm grip on the 270 Electoral College votes needed to win the White House — and may be on her way to an even more decisive victory over Donald Trump.

headline.main: GOP Strategists: Clinton Has Grip on Electoral Votes Needed
headline.print_headline: GOP Strategists: Clinton Has Grip on Electoral Votes Needed
